body:
Yes, that should probably be an error.  It's going to misalign 64-bit loads
and stores.  That's not horrible, but should be avoided.  (Does MOVSD need
to be aligned?  Apparently not, or much worse things should have
happened...)

On Thu, Jan 8, 2015 at 3:09 PM, Josh Bleecher Snyder <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Running nacltest.bash at tip (f21ee1e
> <https://github.com/golang/go/commit/f21ee1e1d8a70abd130d0435eb1a1d2e95c88129>),
> I see a bunch of:
>
> unaligned stack size 20
>
> Should we make this an error so that it gets caught in the builders in the
> future?
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/9539>.
>
